title: The Gargoyle of St John's
description: This is a book published as a serial, one chapter per week. You access the chapters by registering with www.jukepopserials.com or directly at http://www.jukepopserials.com/home/re....Genres:Crime, Fantasy, MysteryThere's something in the architecture. Something awake, something concious. Something Emilia Bradstreet really, really doesn't need. But it needs her. And she might need it more than she thinks.
author: Alice Paladin
